title: Medical self-help: emergency childbirth
creator_credit: United States. Dept. of Health, Education and Welfare
brief_description: Teaches the individual how to take care of his medical and health needs in time of disaster when medical assistance might not be readily available. Presents instructions on emergency childbirth at home. Uses animated drawings.
creator_credit_for_label: United States. Dept. of Health, Education and Welfare
